summary:
Are you tired of Skeletons crumbling at the slightest tap? No backbone? (ahem!)
Well henceforth Skeletons put up much more of a fight!
Draugr are now really tough opponents
A couple of Draugr DeathLords battling against you and it is a very hard fight!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Are you tired of Skeletons crumbling at the slightest tap? No backbone? (ahem!)
Well henceforth Skeletons put up much more of a fight!
Draugr are now really tough opponents
A couple of Draugr DeathLords battling against you and it is a very hard fight![/size]





[size=5]For easy installation install via Nexus Mod Manager
To Manually install, copy the .esp file into your Skyrim\Data folder[/size]




[color=red]Version History:
V1.0 Initial release[/color]

Incidentally - I left Dragon Priests untouched because they are tough enough if you use ERSO's Mighty Dragons mod with the Mighty Dragon Priest option.



[size=5]Thanks to Bethesda for making Skyrim - The best game ever!
Gimp 2.8 for the Logos
All my fellow Modders for being part of the Nexus Community[/size]






[color=#00ffff]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I'm unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

[color=#ffff00]Please DO NOT upload any part of my mod any where else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII
